Please use abbreviations, idioms, transitional phrases, exclamations, dangling modifiers, and colloquial language in a human-like tone. Avoid repetitive phrases and unnatural sentence structures. The first sentence should be full of suspense, and the second sentence should be full of conflict. The text should be both highly advanced and down-to-earth. Every 20 words should have a climax, and the requirements for the climax are interesting, informative, conflicting, and resonating. Please help me optimize this copy ( ).
